original_title: The Trial of Lee Harvey Oswald
overview: The Dallas trial of Lee Harvey Oswald, President John F. Kennedy's alleged assassin, is enacted as it might have occurred. After the defense enters pleas of "not guilty" and "not guilty by reason of insanity," 23 witnesses for the prosecution testify. No verdict is returned.
tagline: Not a Newsreel...A Full Length Motion Picture, Filmed Secretly in Dallas
title: The Trial of Lee Harvey Oswald
